EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners (1386364842.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners (1386364842.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Doug, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful: - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - You can review our “Independent’s Guide” by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke about over the phone by going here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-m-moul.html> (Please bookmark this page.) Please send me your resume at your earliest convenience. Also, If you could, please send me a short description of your day to day activity that you would/want to be doing when consulting on the side. I want to make sure our liability insurance covers the type of work you are doing. I will escalate this and see what pieces of your work if not all, we can run through MBO! I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule by going here. <https://my.timedriver.com/Y3NJC> Best,Meghan ___________________Meghan MoulConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6359f: 703.793.6473e: mmoul@mbopartners.com <mailto:mmoul@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=moul> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them.
